channel.title: [Joke Faction] Literature Club
channel.description:
THe Literature Club has cult-like conversions and cannot convert investigative classes > # [color=pink] JUST MONIKA [/color] >*Just Monika*:Immune to everything except Lynching >*Just MONIKA*-Convert Someone-Day >*JUST MONIKA*-Kill someone, regardless of faction *Be the last one alive*
># [color=pink] Natusiki [/color] >Literature Club Support Day:Let’s Bake!-You will make a tasty cake, this person cannot longer vote as they are stuffing their face with Cake Night: It’s Literature too!: Read some manga with a club member, healing them You will win when MONIKA has eliminated all threats
># [color=pink] Yuri [/color] >LiteratureClub Offensive Day:Read A Book: You read a book with someone in the club, they will get a buff which is secret to everyone except Yuri Night:Stabbu-You stabbu someone making them "Bleed" You will win when MONIKA has eliminated all threats
># [color=pink]Sayori[/color] >Literature Club Social PassIve:Vice President-If Monika dies you will take her place Day: Don’t go to school as you are sad gurl:You will be immune to voting today and immune to death by any mean tonight-2 uses Night:Drag To The Club: You will make someone random Join the club-1 use You will win when MONIKA has eliminated all threats
This is a joke, don't take it seriously

item.title: [Joke Faction] Literature Club
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Insanity:

If Monika die, you also die.

But doesn’t the exact opposite actually happen in the game

Read full topic

item.title: [Joke Faction] Literature Club
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
MC

Literature club offensive

HAIL MONIKA (Passive) - If Monika die, you also die. Night immune.
Hated(Passive)- For every member of literature club you chosen, they will die in 2 night.
Who did I love? (Day)- Choose a member of the literature club, it will effect your night ability. (∞)
Deja Vu(Day) - Reload a day back, people who is dead at that time will came back alive again (1 uses)
I love you(Night) - Gain a effect based on who did you chosen at the day. (The effect you gain will not be lose until you either changed your target or they died.)
(Natsuki: Hatred - Make someone overwhelmed with your anger, occupied them and their vote can be manipulated by you.
Sayori: Depression - Make someone severely depressed, making them unable to talk the next day.
Yuri: Insanity - Fill yourself with power of insane, killing someone who you targeted tonight.)

Read full topic

item.title: [Joke Faction] Literature Club
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
MC

Blue Dragon Toolman

Main character(Passive)- You are surrounded with main character aura that you can’t be converted.
Handsome (Day) - You will use your handsomeness to someone. You will be notified if they are part of Literature club.(∞)
I quit (Day) You will quit the game, unable to talk to anyone but immune to day ability and death tonight.(Can still use night ability) (2 uses)
Delete(Night) - Kill someone, if they are not part of literature club, you will gain depression and join the literature club. (∞)
Goal: Stop the literature club.

Read full topic

item.title: [Joke Faction] Literature Club
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
THe Literature Club has cult-like conversions and cannot convert investigative classes

JUST MONIKA

Just Monika:Immune to everything except Lynching
Just MONIKA-Convert Someone-Day
JUST MONIKA-Kill someone, regardless of faction
Be the last one alive

Natusiki

Literature Club Support
Day:Let’s Bake!-You will make a tasty cake, this person cannot longer vote as they are stuffing their face with Cake
Night: It’s Literature too!: Read some manga with a club member, healing them
You will win when MONIKA has eliminated all threats

Yuri

LiteratureClub Offensive
Day:Read A Book: You read a book with someone in the club, they will get a buff which is secret to everyone except Yuri
Night:Stabbu-You stabbu someone making them “Bleed”
You will win when MONIKA has eliminated all threats

Sayori

Literature Club Social
PassIve:Vice President-If Monika dies you will take her place
Day: Don’t go to school as you are sad gurl:You will be immune to voting today and immune to death by any mean tonight-2 uses
Night:Drag To The Club: You will make someone random Join the club-1 use
You will win when MONIKA has eliminated all threats

This is a joke, don’t take it seriously

Read full topic
